TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WriteableBitmap extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource
Public NotInheritable Class WriteableBitmap Inherits BitmapSource

summary.span: 提供可以寫入及更新的 。

span.span: Provides a that can be written to and updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來更新，並呈現每個畫面格為基礎的點陣圖。Use the class to update and render a bitmap on a per-frame basis. 這是可用來產生演算法的內容，例如碎形映像，以及資料視覺效果，例如音樂視覺化檢視。This is useful for generating algorithmic content, such as a fractal image, and for data visualization, such as a music visualizer. 類別會使用兩個緩衝區。The class uses two buffers. *背景緩衝區*配置系統記憶體中，並累積目前未顯示的內容。The *back buffer* is allocated in system memory and accumulates content that is not currently displayed. *前景緩衝區*配置系統記憶體與包含目前顯示的內容。The *front buffer* is allocated in system memory and contains the content that is currently displayed. 呈現系統會將前景緩衝區複製到視訊記憶體以供顯示。The rendering system copies the front buffer to video memory for display. 兩個執行緒使用的緩衝區。Two threads use these buffers. *使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒*產生 UI，但不會顯示該螢幕。The *user interface (UI) thread* generates the UI but does not present it to the screen. UI 執行緒會回應使用者輸入、 計時器和其他事件。The UI thread responds to user input, timers, and other events. 應用程式可以有多個 UI 執行緒。An application can have multiple UI threads. *轉譯執行緒*撰寫，並呈現從 UI 執行緒的變更。The *render thread* composes and renders changes from the UI thread. 沒有每個應用程式只有一個呈現執行緒。There is only one render thread per application. UI 執行緒會將內容寫入背景緩衝區。The UI thread writes content to the back buffer. 呈現執行緒會讀取來自前景緩衝區的內容，並將它複製到視訊記憶體。The render thread reads content from the front buffer and copies it to video memory. 指向背景緩衝區的變更會追蹤與變更的矩形區域。Changes to the back buffer are tracked with changed rectangular regions. 呼叫其中一種多載來更新，並會自動顯示背景緩衝區中的內容。Call one of the overloads to update and display content in the back buffer automatically. 為了進一步控制更新，以指向背景緩衝區的多執行緒存取，請使用下列工作流程。For greater control over updates, and for multi-threaded access to the back buffer, use the following workflow. 1. 呼叫方法，以保留背景緩衝區以供更新。Call the method to reserve the back buffer for updates. 2. 取得指向背景緩衝區的指標存取屬性。Obtain a pointer to the back buffer by accessing the property. 3. 寫入背景緩衝區中的變更。Write changes to the back buffer. 其他執行緒可能會將變更寫入到後端緩衝區時已鎖定。Other threads may write changes to the back buffer when the is locked. 4. 呼叫方法，以表示已變更的區域。Call the method to indicate areas that have changed. 5. 呼叫方法來釋放背景緩衝區，並允許至畫面的呈現方式。Call the method to release the back buffer and allow presentation to the screen. 當更新會傳送至轉譯執行緒時，呈現執行緒會將已變更的矩形從背景緩衝區複製到前景緩衝區中。When updates are sent to the rendering thread, the rendering thread copies the changed rectangles from the back buffer to the front buffer. 呈現系統控制此交換，以避免死結，並且重繪其成品，例如 「 分裂 」。The rendering system controls this exchange to avoid deadlocks and redraw artifacts, such as "tearing". ## Examples 下列範例示範如何可用來當做來源繪製像素，當滑鼠移動時。The following example demonstrates how a can be used as the source of an to draw pixels when the mouse moves. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#WriteableBitmapFullPage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#writeablebitmapfullpage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式，而不要使用這個建構函式。The constructor is preferred over using this constructor. 如果`source`不會使用原生支援的點陣圖格式，轉換會針對每個畫面格的更新，進而導致效能降低所套用的格式。If `source` does not use a natively supported bitmap format, format conversions are applied for each frame update, which reduces performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 偏好使用的值為`pixelFormat`都和。The preferred values for `pixelFormat` are and . 這些格式原生支援，而且不需要格式轉換。These formats are natively supported and do not require a format conversion. 其他`pixelFormat`值需要格式轉換針對每個畫面格的更新，這會降低效能。Other `pixelFormat` values require a format conversion for each frame update, which reduces performance.

span.span: Specifies the area of the bitmap that changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以表示您的程式碼有指向背景緩衝區所做的變更。Call the method to indicate changes your code has made to the back buffer. 當您多次呼叫這個方法時，已變更的區域就會累積足夠，但不是一定是最小，表示法中。When you call this method multiple times, the changed areas are accumulated in a sufficient, but not necessarily minimal, representation. 為了提高效率，只會標示為已變更的區域保證向前複製到前端的緩衝區。For efficiency, only the areas that are marked as dirty are guaranteed to be copied forward to the front buffer. 不過，所以您必須確保整個背景緩衝區都是有效的可能會轉寄、 複製點陣圖的任何部分。However, any portion of the bitmap may be copied forward, so you must ensure that the entire back buffer is always valid. 呼叫方法呼叫之間只並中所述的方法類別 < 備註 >。Call the method only between calls to the and methods, as described in the class remarks. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定區域中的後端緩衝區使用變更方法。The following code example shows how to specify the area of the back buffer that changed by using the method. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#2)]

summary.span: 取得指向背景緩衝區的指標。

span.span: Gets a pointer to the back buffer.

value.span: ，指向背景緩衝區基底位址 (Base Address)。

span.span: An that points to the base address of the back buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 背景緩衝區會包含使用者所要求的像素格式的點陣圖內容。The back buffer contains the bitmap contents in the pixel format requested by the user. 更新背景緩衝區之間的呼叫才和方法。Update the back buffer only between calls to the and methods. 如果您未遵循鎖定/解除鎖定工作流程中所述類別備註，未定義的行為，例如撕裂，可能會發生。If you do not follow the Lock/Unlock workflow described in the class remarks, undefined behaviors, such as tearing, can occur. 背景緩衝區的位址不會變更。The address of the back buffer does not change. ## 執行緒安全Thread Safety 您可以傳遞指標外部元件和其他執行緒進行處理，但如果您這樣做，您必須提供您自己的執行緒協調。You can pass the pointer to external components and other threads for processing, but if you do, you must provide you own thread coordination. 特別是，您必須確定在 UI 執行緒，會指定已變更的區域，藉由呼叫方法，並在 UI 執行緒解除鎖定的緩衝區，藉由呼叫方法。In particular, you must ensure that the UI thread specifies changed areas by calling the method, and that the UI thread unlocks the buffer by calling the method.

summary.span: 保留背景緩衝區以供更新。

span.span: Reserves the back buffer for updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的鎖定計數遞增。The method increments the lock count. 當會鎖定，呈現系統不會傳送更新，直到完全透過呼叫來解除鎖定方法。When a is locked, the rendering system does not send updates until the is fully unlocked by calls to the method. 您可以使用方法，以支援多執行緒的實作。You can use the method to support multi-threaded implementations. 在這些情況下，UI 執行緒鎖定點陣圖，並公開 （expose） 的其他執行緒的背景緩衝區。In these scenarios, the UI thread locks the bitmap and exposes the back buffer to other threads. 當背景工作執行緒完成畫面格時，UI 執行緒將已變更的矩形新增，並解除鎖定緩衝區。When the worker thread has finished a frame, the UI thread adds changed rectangles and unlocks the buffer. 當呈現執行緒取得鎖定，以在背景緩衝區以將其複製到前端的緩衝區上，可以封鎖 UI 執行緒。The UI thread can block when the render thread acquires a lock on the back buffer to copy it forward to the front buffer. 如果此區塊中的延遲時間太長，請使用先等候一小段時間，然後解除封鎖 UI 執行緒背景緩衝區鎖定時執行其他工作的方法。If the latency from this block is too long, use the method to wait for a short time and then unblock the UI thread to perform other tasks while the back buffer is locked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用保留背景緩衝區方法。The following code example shows how to reserve the back buffer by using the method. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法來更新使用的內容自動`sourceBuffer`。Call the method to update the automatically with the contents of `sourceBuffer`. 呼叫這個方法就相當於使用並中所述的工作流程類別 < 備註 >。Calling this method is the equivalent of using the and workflow described in the class remarks. > [!NOTE] > 在部分信任中使用此多載。Use this overload in partial trust.
